00273     /**
00274      * 
00275      */
00276     public function __construct()
00277     {
00278         if( !self::$_hasStatic ) {
00279             
00280             self::_setStaticVars();
00281         }
00282         
00283         $this->_moduleClass   = get_class( $this );
00284         $this->_reflection    = new ReflectionObject( $this );
00285         $this->_moduleName    = $GLOBALS[ 'MCONF' ][ 'name' ];
00286         $this->_moduleNumber  = substr( $this->_moduleName, -1 );
00287         $this->_moduleSection = substr( $this->_moduleName, 0, strpos( $this->_moduleName, '_' ) );
00288         
00289         $this->_backPath = $GLOBALS[ 'BACK_PATH' ];
00290         
00291         $this->_modVars = t3lib_div::_GP( $this->_moduleName );
00292         
00293         foreach( $this->include_once as $includeFile ) {
00294             
00295             require_once( $includeFile );
00296         }
00297         
00298         $extPathInfo = explode( DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $this->_reflection->getFileName() );
00299         
00300         array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00301         array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00302         
00303         $this->_extKey             = array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00304         
00305         $this->_extPath            = t3lib_extMgm::extPath( $this->_extKey );
00306         
00307         $this->_extRelativePath    = t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath( $this->_extKey );
00308         
00309         $this->_modulePath         = $this->_extPath . 'mod' . $this->_moduleNumber;
00310         
00311         $this->_moduleRelativePath = $this->_extRelativePath . 'mod1/';
00312         
00313         $this->_uploadDirectory    = str_replace(
00314             PATH_site,
00315             '',
00316             t3lib_div::getFileAbsFileName( 'uploads/tx_' . str_replace( '_', '', $this->_extKey ) . '/' )
00317         );
00318         
00319         $this->_lang               = tx_oop_Lang_Getter::getInstance( 'EXT:' . $this->_extKey . '/lang/mod' . $this->_moduleNumber . '.xml' );
00320         $this->_modData            = tx_oop_Session_Data_Backend::getInstance( $this->_moduleName );
00321         $this->_content            = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'div' );
00322     }
00323     
00324     /**
00325      * 
00326      */
00327     public function __toString()
00328     {
00329         $content                = '';
00330         $markers                = array();
00331         $markers[ 'CONTENT' ]   = ( string )$this->_content;
00332         
00333         if( count( $this->MOD_MENU[ 'function' ] ) ) {
00334             
00335             $markers[ 'FUNC_MENU' ] = t3lib_BEfunc::getFuncMenu(
00336                 $this->id,
00337                 'SET[function]',
00338                 $this->MOD_SETTINGS[ 'function' ],
00339                 $this->MOD_MENU[ 'function' ]
00340             );
00341             
00342         } else {
00343             
00344             $markers[ 'FUNC_MENU' ] = '';
00345         }
00346         
00347         $content                = $this->doc->startPage( $this->_lang->title )
00348                                 . $this->doc->moduleBody( $this->_pageInfos, $this->_buttons, $markers )
00349                                 . $this->doc->endPage();
00350         
00351         return $this->doc->insertStylesAndJS( $content );
00352     }

00358     {
00359         self::$_db              = tx_oop_Database_Layer::getInstance();
00360         self::$_str             = tx_oop_String_Utils::getInstance();
00361         self::$_tce             = tx_oop_Typo3_Core_Engine::getInstance();
00362         self::$_t3Db            = $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_DB' ];
00363         self::$_t3Lang          = $GLOBALS[ 'LANG' ];
00364         self::$_beUser          = $GLOBALS[ 'BE_USER' ];
00365         self::$_tcaDescr        = $GLOBALS[ 'TCA_DESCR' ];
00366         self::$_tca             = $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ];
00367         self::$_client          = $GLOBALS[ 'CLIENT' ];
00368         self::$_t3Conf          = $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_CONF_VARS' ];
00369         self::$_oopPath         = t3lib_extMgm::extPath( 'oop' );
00370         self::$_oopRelativePath = t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath( 'oop' );
00371         self::$_hasStatic       = true;
00372     }

00374     /**
00375      * 
00376      */
00377     private function _addJs( $path )
00378     {
00379         $js                 = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'script' );
00380         $js[ 'type' ]       = 'text/javascript';
00381         $js[ 'charset' ]    = 'utf-8';
00382         $js[ 'src' ]        = $this->_backPath . self::$_oopRelativePath . 'res/javascript/' . $path;
00383         
00384         $this->doc->JScode .= self::$_str->NL . $js;
00385     }

00387     /**
00388      * 
00389      */
00390     protected function _registerHook( $name, array $params = array() )
00391     {
00392         if( isset( self::$_t3Conf[ 'EXTCONF' ][ $this->_extKey ][ $name ] )
00393             && is_array( self::$_t3Conf[ 'EXTCONF' ][ $this->_extKey ][ $name ] )
00394         ) {
00395             
00396             foreach( self::$_t3Conf[ 'EXTCONF' ][ $this->_extKey ][ $name ] as $callBack ) {
00397                 
00398                 t3lib_div::callUserFunction( $callBack, $params, $this ); 
00399             }
00400         }
00401     }
00402     
00403     /**
00404      * Creates a thumbnail
00405      * 
00406      * @param   string              The file path (relative to the upload directory)
00407      * @param   int                 The thumbnail maximum width
00408      * @param   int                 The thumbnail maximum height
00409      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The thumbnail picture
00410      */
00411     protected function _createThumbnail( $file, $width = 100, $height = 100 )
00412     {
00413         // Gets the file absolute path
00414         $fileAbsPath  = PATH_site . $this->_uploadDirectory . $file;
00415         
00416         // Security check
00417         $fileCheck    = basename( $fileAbsPath)
00418                       . ':'
00419                       . filemtime( $fileAbsPath )
00420                       . ':'
00421                       . self::$_typo3ConfVars[ 'SYS' ][ 'encryptionKey' ];
00422         
00423         
00424         // URL that will generate the thumbnail
00425         $url          = self::$_backPath
00426                       . 'thumbs.php?size='
00427                       . $width
00428                       . 'x'
00429                       . $height
00430                       . '&file='
00431                       . rawurlencode( '../' . self::$_uploadDirectory . $file )
00432                       . '&md5sum='
00433                       . t3lib_div::shortMD5( $fileCheck );
00434         
00435         // Creates the image tag
00436         $img          = tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'img' );
00437         $img[ 'src' ] = htmlspecialchars( $url );
00438         $img[ 'alt' ] = $file;
00439         
00440         // Returns the thumbnail
00441         return $img;
00442     }
00443     
00444     /**
00445      * Creates a link with module variables
00446      * 
00447      * @param   string              The link text
00448      * @param   array               The module variables to set, as key/value pairs
00449      * @param   array               The module variables to keep
00450      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The link
00451      */
00452     protected function _link( $text, array $params = array(), $keepModVars = false )
00453     {
00454         // Base url
00455         $url = ( $keepModVars ) ? t3lib_div::linkThisScript( array( $this->_moduleName => $this->_modVars ) ) : t3lib_div::linkThisScript();
00456         
00457         // Process each parameter
00458         foreach( $params as $key => $value ) {
00459             
00460             // Adds the current parameter
00461             $url .= '&' . $this->_moduleName . '[' . $key . ']=' . $value;
00462         }
00463         
00464         // Creates the full link
00465         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00466         $link[ 'href' ]    = $url;
00467         
00468         // Adds the linked text
00469         $link->addTextData( $text );
00470         
00471         // Returns the link
00472         return $link;
00473     }
00474     
00475     /**
00476      * Creates a link to a function of the menu
00477      * 
00478      * @param   string  $text       The link text
00479      * @param   int     $function   The menu function ID
00480      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The link
00481      */
00482     protected function _functionLink( $text, $function )
00483     {
00484         // Creates the URL
00485         $url = t3lib_div::linkThisScript(
00486             array(
00487                 'SET' => array(
00488                     'function' => $function
00489                 )
00490             )
00491         );
00492         
00493         // Creates the full link
00494         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00495         $link[ 'href' ]    = $url;
00496         
00497         // Adds the linked text
00498         $link->addTextData( $text );
00499         
00500         // Returns the link
00501         return $link;
00502     }

00504     /**
00505      * Creates a link to the edit view of a record
00506      * 
00507      * @param   string  $table      The table name
00508      * @param   int     $uid        The ID of the record
00509      * @param   string  $text       The link text
00510      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The link
00511      */
00512     protected function _editLink( $table, $uid, $text )
00513     {
00514         // On click action
00515         $onClick = t3lib_BEfunc::editOnClick(
00516             '&edit[' . $table . '][' . $uid . ']=edit',
00517             $this->_backPath
00518         );
00519         
00520         // Creates the full link
00521         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00522         $link[ 'href' ]    = '#';
00523         $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars( $onClick );
00524         
00525         // Adds the linked text
00526         $link->addTextData( $text );
00527         
00528         // Returns the link
00529         return $link;
00530     }
00531     
00532     /**
00533      * Gets an icon from the extension
00534      * 
00535      * @param   string  $name       The icon name
00536      * @param   array               The align parameter of the IMG tag
00537      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The image tag
00538      */
00539     protected function _skinImg( $name, $align = 'bottom' )
00540     {
00541         // Gets the file absolute path
00542         $fileAbsPath = $this->_extPath
00543                      . 'res/img/'
00544                      . $name;
00545         
00546         // Checks if the requested file exists
00547         if( file_exists( $fileAbsPath ) && is_readable( $fileAbsPath ) ) {
00548             
00549             // Gets the image size
00550             $size   = getimagesize( $fileAbsPath );
00551             
00552             // Creates the image tag
00553             $img             = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'img' );
00554             $img[ 'src' ]    = $this->_backPath . $this->_extRelativePath . 'res/img/' . $name;
00555             $img[ 'width' ]  = $size[ 0 ];
00556             $img[ 'height' ] = $size[ 1 ];
00557             $img[ 'alt' ]    = $name;
00558             $img[ 'hspace' ] = '0';
00559             $img[ 'vspace' ] = '0';
00560             $img[ 'border' ] = '0';
00561             $img[ 'align' ]  = $align;
00562             
00563             // Returns the image tag
00564             return $img;
00565         }
00566         
00567         // File not found
00568         return '';
00569     }
00570     
00571     /**
00572      * Gets an icon from TYPO3
00573      * 
00574      * @param   string  $name       The icon name
00575      * @param   array               The align parameter of the IMG tag
00576      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The image tag
00577      */
00578     protected function _t3SkinImg( $name, $align = 'bottom' )
00579     {
00580         // Gets the image source
00581         $imgSrc = t3lib_iconWorks::skinImg( $this->_backPath, $name, '', 1 );
00582         
00583         // Gets the file absolute path
00584         $fileAbsPath = $GLOBALS[ 'TBE_STYLES' ][ 'skinImgAutoCfg' ][ 'absDir' ] . $name;
00585         
00586         // Checks if the requested file exists
00587         if( file_exists( $fileAbsPath ) && is_readable( $fileAbsPath ) ) {
00588             
00589             // Gets the image size
00590             $size   = getimagesize( $fileAbsPath );
00591             
00592             // Creates the image tag
00593             $img             = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'img' );
00594             $img[ 'src' ]    = $imgSrc;
00595             $img[ 'width' ]  = $size[ 0 ];
00596             $img[ 'height' ] = $size[ 1 ];
00597             $img[ 'alt' ]    = $name;
00598             $img[ 'hspace' ] = '0';
00599             $img[ 'vspace' ] = '0';
00600             $img[ 'border' ] = '0';
00601             $img[ 'align' ]  = $align;
00602             
00603             // Returns the image tag
00604             return $img;
00605         }
00606         
00607         // File not found
00608         return '';
00609     }
00610     
00611     /**
00612      * 
00613      */
00614     protected function _addButton( $name, $file, $fromSkin = true )
00615     {
00616         // Creates the button image
00617         $img = ( $fromSkin ) ? $this->_t3SkinImg( $file ) : $this->_skinImg( $file );
00618         
00619         // URL
00620         $url = t3lib_div::linkThisScript( array( $this->_moduleName => array( 'actions' => array( $name => true ) ) ) );
00621         
00622         // Creates the full link
00623         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00624         $link[ 'href' ]    = $url;
00625         
00626         // Adds the button image
00627         $link->addTextData( $img );
00628         
00629         // Adds the button
00630         $this->_buttons[ $name ] = $link;
00631     }
00632     
00633     /**
00634      * Gets the CSM menu for a record
00635      * 
00636      * This method creates an icon of the requested record with a
00637      * Context Sensitive Menu (CSM).
00638      * 
00639      * @param   string              The table of the record
00640      * @param   array               The record's row
00641      * @param   array               The align parameter of the IMG tag
00642      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The icon with a CSM menu link
00643      */
00644     protected function _recordIcon( $table, $row, $align = 'bottom' )
00645     {
00646         // Ensures the record's row is an array (may be an stdClass object)
00647         $row = ( array )$row;
00648         
00649         // Gets the record icon
00650         $icon = t3lib_iconWorks::getIconImage(
00651             $table,
00652             $row,
00653             $this->_backPath,
00654             'align="' . $bottom . '"'
00655         );
00656         
00657         // On click action
00658         $onClick = $this->doc->wrapClickMenuOnIcon(
00659             $icon,
00660             $table,
00661             $row[ 'uid' ],
00662             1,
00663             '',
00664             '',
00665             true
00666         );
00667 
00668         // Creates the link
00669         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00670         $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars( $onClick );
00671         
00672         // Checks if we have to add the context menu event
00673         if( isset( $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_CONF_VARS' ][ 'BE' ][ 'useOnContextMenuHandler' ] )
00674             && $GLOBALS[ 'TYPO3_CONF_VARS' ][ 'BE' ][ 'useOnContextMenuHandler' ]
00675         ) {
00676             
00677             // Adds the context menu event
00678             $link[ 'oncontextmenu' ] = htmlspecialchars( $onClick );
00679         }
00680         
00681         // Adds the icon to the link
00682         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00683         
00684         // Returns the link
00685         return $link;
00686     }
00687     
00688     protected function _editIcon( $table, $id, $align = 'bottom' )
00689     {
00690         $icon              = $this->_t3SkinImg( 'gfx/edit2.gif', $align );
00691         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00692         $link[ 'href' ]    = '#';
00693         $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars(
00694             t3lib_BEfunc::editOnClick(
00695                 '&edit[' . $table . '][' . $id . ']=edit',
00696                 $this->_backPath
00697             )
00698         );
00699         
00700         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00701         
00702         return $link;
00703     }
00704     
00705     protected function _infoIcon( $table, $id, $align = 'bottom' )
00706     {
00707         $icon              = $this->_t3SkinImg( 'gfx/zoom2.gif', $align );
00708         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00709         $link[ 'href' ]    = '#';
00710         $link[ 'onclick' ] = 'top.launchView( \''
00711                            .  $table
00712                            .  '\', \''
00713                            .  $id
00714                            .  '\' ); return false;';
00715         
00716         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00717         
00718         return $link;
00719     }
00720     
00721     protected function _deleteIcon( $table, $id, $confirmDialog = true, $align = 'bottom' )
00722     {
00723         $icon              = $this->_t3SkinImg( 'gfx/garbage.gif', $align );
00724         $link              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'a' );
00725         $link[ 'href' ]    = htmlspecialchars(
00726             $this->doc->issueCommand(
00727                 '&cmd[' . $table . ']['. $id .'][delete]=1'
00728             )
00729         );
00730         
00731         if( $confirmDialog ) {
00732             
00733             $link[ 'onclick' ] = htmlspecialchars(
00734                 'return confirm( \''
00735               . self::$_t3Lang->sL( 'LLL:EXT:lang/locallang_alt_doc.xml:deleteWarning' )
00736               . '\' );'
00737             );
00738         }
00739         
00740         $link->addTextData( $icon );
00741         
00742         return $link;
00743     }
00744     
00745     /**
00746      * Gets the label for a database field
00747      * 
00748      * @param   string  The table name
00749      * @param   string  The field name
00750      * @return  string  The label
00751      */
00752     protected function _getFieldLabel( $table, $field )
00753     {
00754         // Checks if the table exists in the TCA
00755         if( !isset( $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ][ $table ] ) ) {
00756             
00757             // The table does not exist
00758             return '';
00759         }
00760         
00761         // Checks if the TCA is loaded
00762         if( !isset( $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ][ $table ][ 'columns' ] ) ) {
00763             
00764             // Loads the TCA
00765             t3lib_div::loadTCA( $table );
00766         }
00767         
00768         // Checks if the field exists in the TCA
00769         if( !isset( $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ][ $table ][ 'columns' ][ $field ] ) ) {
00770             
00771             // The field does not exist
00772             return '';
00773         }
00774         
00775         // Returns the label
00776         return self::$_t3Lang->sL( $GLOBALS[ 'TCA' ][ $table ][ 'columns' ][ $field ][ 'label' ] );
00777     }
00778     
00779     
00780     
00781     /**
00782      * Creates a select menu
00783      * 
00784      * @param   string              The name of the select
00785      * @param   string              The label for the select menu
00786      * @param   array               The items to place on the menu, as value/label pairs
00787      * @return  tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag    The select menu
00788      */
00789     protected function _createSelect( $name, $label, array $items )
00790     {
00791         // Creates the container DIV
00792         $container            = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'div' );
00793         $container[ 'style' ] = 'overflow: hidden; height: 100%;';
00794         
00795         // Creates the label and it's container DIV
00796         $labelDiv             = $container->div;
00797         $labelDiv[ 'style' ]  = 'float: left; width: 150px; font-weight: bold;';
00798         $label                = $labelDiv->label;
00799         $label[ 'for' ]       = $this->_moduleName . '-' . $name;
00800         
00801         // Creates the select and it's container DIV
00802         $selectDiv            = $container->div;
00803         $selectDiv[ 'style' ] = 'float: left;';
00804         $select               = $selectDiv->select;
00805         $select[ 'name' ]     = $this->_moduleName . '[' . $name . ']';
00806         $select[ 'id' ]       = $this->_moduleName . '-' . $name;
00807         
00808         // Process the items
00809         foreach( $items as $value => $label ) {
00810             
00811             // Creates the option tag
00812             $option            = $select->option;
00813             $option[ 'value' ] = $value;
00814             
00815             // Checks the module variables
00816             if( $this->_modVars[ $name ] == $value ) {
00817                 
00818                 // The current item is selected
00819                 $option[ 'selected' ] = 'selected';
00820             }
00821         }
00822         
00823         // Returns the full select
00824         return $container;
00825     }
00826

00828      * 
00829      */
00830     protected function _checkAction( $name )
00831     {
00832         return isset( $this->_modVars[ 'actions' ][ $name ] );
00833     }

00838     protected function _getActiveMenuItem()
00839     {
00840         return $this->MOD_SETTINGS[ 'function' ];
00841     }

00843     /**
00844      * Includes the jQuery JS framework
00845      * 
00846      * @return  NULL
00847      */
00848     protected function _includeJQuery()
00849     {
00850         // Only includes the script once
00851         if( self::$_hasJQuery === false ) {
00852             
00853             // Adds the JS script
00854             $this->_addJs( 'jquery/jquery.js' );
00855             
00856             // Script has been included
00857             self::$_hasJQuery = true;
00858         }
00859     }
00860

00863      *

00869         if( self::$_hasJQueryUi === false ) {
00870             
00871             // Adds the JS script
00872             $this->_addJs( 'jquery-ui/jquery-ui.js' );
00873             
00874             // Script has been included
00875             self::$_hasJQueryUi = true;
00876         }
00877     }

00899      *

00902     protected function _includePrototype()

00914     
00915     /**
00916      * Includes the Scriptaculous JS framework
00917      * 
00918      * @return  NULL
00919      * @see     _includePrototype
00920      */
00921     protected function _includeScriptaculous()
00922     {
00923         // Only includes the script once
00924         if( self::$_hasScriptaculous === false ) {
00925             
00926             // Includes the Prototype JS framework
00927             $this->_includePrototype();
00928             
00929             // Adds the JS script
00930             $this->_addJs( 'scriptaculous/scriptaculous.js' );
00931             
00932             // Script has been included
00933             self::$_hasScriptaculous = true;
00934         }
00935     }
00936     
00937     /**
00938      * Includes a Webtoolkit script
00939      * 
00940      * Available scripts are:
00941      * - base64
00942      * - crc32
00943      * - md5
00944      * - sha1
00945      * - sha256
00946      * - url
00947      * - utf8
00948      * 
00949      * @param   string  The name of the script to include
00950      * @return  NULL
00951      */
00952     protected function _includeWebtoolkitScript( $script )
00953     {
00954         // Only includes the script once
00955         if( !isset( self::$_webtoolkitLoadedScripts[ $script ] ) ) {
00956             
00957             // Adds the JS script
00958             $this->_addJs( 'webtoolkit/' . $script . '.js' );
00959             
00960             // Script has been included
00961             self::$_webtoolkitLoadedScripts[ $script ] = true;
00962         }
00963     }
00964     
00965     /**
00966      * Includes a jQuery plugin
00967      * 
00968      * Available plugins are:
00969      * - accordion
00970      * - dimensions
00971      * 
00972      * @param   string  The name of the plugin to include
00973      * @return  NULL
00974      */
00975     protected function _includeJQueryPlugin( $plugin )
00976     {
00977         // Only includes the script once
00978         if( !isset( self::$_jQueryLoadedPlugins[ $plugin ] ) ) {
00979             
00980             // Checks for dependancies
00981             if( isset( self::$_jQueryPluginsDeps[ $plugin ] ) ) {
00982                 
00983                 // Process each dependancy
00984                 foreach( self::$_jQueryPluginsDeps[ $plugin ] as $deps ) {
00985                     
00986                     // Includes the plugin
00987                     $this->_includeJQueryPlugin( $deps );
00988                 }
00989             }
00990             
00991             // Adds the JS script
00992             $this->_addJs( 'jquery/jquery' . $plugin . '.js' );
00993             
00994             // Script has been included
00995             self::$_jQueryLoadedPlugins[ $plugin ] = true;
00996         }
00997     }

00999     /**
01000      * 
01001      */
01002     public function menuConfig()
01003     {
01004         $this->MOD_MENU = array(
01005             'function' => array()
01006         );
01007         
01008         $this->_setMenuItems( $this->MOD_MENU[ 'function' ] );
01009         
01010         parent::menuConfig();
01011     }
01012     
01013     /**
01014      * 
01015      */
01016     public function createModulePage()
01017     {
01018         parent::init();
01019         
01020         $this->_pageInfos = t3lib_BEfunc::readPageAccess(
01021             $this->id,
01022             $this->perms_clause
01023         );
01024         
01025         $access = is_array( $this->_pageInfos ) ? true : false;
01026         
01027         $this->doc = t3lib_div::makeInstance( 'template' );
01028         
01029         $this->doc->setModuleTemplate( $this->_extPath . 'res/html/mod' . $this->_moduleNumber . '.html' );
01030         
01031         $this->doc->backPath = $this->_backPath;
01032         
01033         $this->_buttons[ 'csh' ] = t3lib_BEfunc::cshItem(
01034             '_MOD_' . $this->_moduleSection . '_func',
01035             '',
01036             $this->_backPath
01037         );
01038         
01039         $this->_addButton( 'save', 'gfx/savedok.gif' );
01040         
01041         if( self::$_beUser->mayMakeShortcut() ) {
01042             
01043             $this->_buttons[ 'shortcut' ] = $this->doc->makeShortcutIcon(
01044                 '',
01045                 'function',
01046                 $this->_moduleName
01047             );
01048         }
01049         
01050         // Checks wether the current BE user can access this module
01051         if( ( $this->id && $access )
01052             || ( self::$_beUser->user[ 'admin' ] && !$this->id )
01053         ) {
01054             
01055             $contextMenuParts = $this->doc->getContextMenuCode();
01056             
01057             $this->doc->bodyTagAdditions = $contextMenuParts[ 1 ];
01058             
01059             // Creates the module's form tag
01060             $form                  = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'form' );
01061             $form[ 'action' ]      = '';
01062             $form[ 'method' ]      = 'post';
01063             $form[ 'enctype' ]     = self::$_t3Conf[ 'SYS' ][ 'form_enctype' ];
01064             $form[ 'name' ]        = $this->_moduleName . '_form';
01065             $form[ 'id' ]          = $this->_moduleName . '_form';
01066             
01067             $this->doc->form       = ( string )$form;
01068             
01069             $jsCode                = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'script' );
01070             $jsCode[ 'type' ]      = 'text/javascript';
01071             $jsCode[ 'charset' ]   = 'utf-8';
01072             $jsCodeData            = '// <![CDATA['
01073                                    . self::$_str->NL
01074                                    . 'var script_ended = 0;'
01075                                    . self::$_str->NL
01076                                    . 'function jumpToUrl( URL ) {'
01077                                    . self::$_str->NL
01078                                    . '    document.location = URL;'
01079                                    . self::$_str->NL
01080                                    . '}'
01081                                    . self::$_str->NL
01082                                    . '// ]]>';
01083             
01084             $jsCode->addTextData( $jsCodeData );
01085             
01086             $this->doc->JScode     = ( string )$jsCode . self::$_str->NL . $contextMenuParts[ 0 ];
01087             
01088             $postCode              = new tx_oop_Xhtml_Tag( 'script' );
01089             $postCode[ 'type' ]    = 'text/javascript';
01090             $postCode[ 'charset' ] = 'utf-8';
01091             
01092             // Adds some JavaScript code
01093             $postCodeData          = '// <![CDATA['
01094                                    . self::$_str->NL
01095                                    . 'script_ended = 1;'
01096                                    . self::$_str->NL
01097                                    . 'if( top.fsMod ) {'
01098                                    . self::$_str->NL
01099                                    . '    top.fsMod.recentIds[ \'' . $this->_moduleSection . '\' ] = 0;'
01100                                    . self::$_str->NL
01101                                    . '}'
01102                                    . self::$_str->NL
01103                                    . '// ]]>';
01104             
01105             $postCode->addTextData( $jsCodeData );
01106             
01107             $this->doc->postCode   = ( string )$postCode . self::$_str->NL . $contextMenuParts[ 2 ];
01108             
01109             $this->_content->comment( 'Start of module content' );
01110             
01111             $this->_getModuleContent( $this->_content->div );
01112             
01113             $this->_content->comment( 'End of module content' );
01114         }
01115     }
